amendment.description: Amendment allows states to enact anti-corruption laws curbing the practice of "pay-to-play" contracting without losing Federal-aid highway funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-15 to allow states to enact anti-corruption laws curbing the practice of `pay-to-play' contracting without losing their federal-aid highway dollars.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
